article_title: ICC prosecutor seeks arrest of Israeli and Hamas leaders
sentence: The  accusations  against  the  Israeli  and  Hamas  leaders  stem  from  the  events  of  7  October,  when  waves  of  Hamas  gunmen  attacked  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  252  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: ICC prosecutor seeks arrest of Israeli and Hamas leaders
sentence: The  attack  triggered  the  current  war,  in  which  at  least  35,500  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
